entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 9:52 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then rain. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:52 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 9:52 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
